CustomObject.description:
Indicates an allowlist/blocklist of Services for specified GL Codes
Specifying Excluded GL Codes will prevent that GL Code being generated for a Service Category, even if it is included. Specifying Included GL Codes will ONLY create records for any included GL Codes for that Service Category.
Excluded = remove cell from service Included = only show specified GL Codes for service (eg Centrally Held for QFR)
CustomObject.label: Service GL Code Restriction
